Subject: liferea: Fails to update feed

X-SA-Exim-Scanned: Yes (on cassiel.sirena.org.uk)
Delivered-To: submit@bugs.debian.org
X-Spam-Checker-Version: SpamAssassin 2.60-bugs.debian.org_2005_01_02 
	(1.212-2003-09-23-exp) on rietz.debian.org
X-Spam-Level: 
X-Spam-Status: No, hits=-11.0 required=4.0 tests=BAYES_00,FROMDEVELOPER,
	HAS_PACKAGE autolearn=ham version=2.60-bugs.debian.org_2005_01_02

Package: liferea
Version: 1.2.16b-1
Severity: important

I noticed that the feed below was not being updated, even though there
were new posts and even with an explicit poll being triggered:

      <outline title="Notes from a messy desk" text="Notes from a messy desk" description="Notes from a messy desk" type="pie" id="jylutvj" sortColumn="time" viewMode="0" htmlUrl="http://woss.name" xmlUrl="http://feeds.feedburner.com/wossname" updateInterval="-1" etag="/dot1sSrBIPAObPqV98kujPT2ZE" lastModified="Sun, 15 Jul 2007 17:45:12 GMT" lastPollTime="1184620761" lastFaviconPollTime="1183203820"/>

adding a new copy of the feed shows successful updates:

      <outline title="Notes from a messy desk" text="Notes from a messy desk" description="Notes from a messy desk" type="pie" id="pudybjw" sortColumn="time" viewMode="0" htmlUrl="http://woss.name" xmlUrl="http://feeds.feedburner.com/wossname" updateInterval="-1" etag="/dot1sSrBIPAObPqV98kujPT2ZE" lastModified="Mon, 16 Jul 2007 20:41:56 GMT" lastPollTime="1184620774" lastFaviconPollTime="1184620776"/>

Unfortunately, I've carefully gone and deleted the cache for the failing
feed now :( .

-- System Information:

  APT prefers unstable
  APT policy: (500, 'unstable')

Description:=20
 liferea    - feed aggregator for GNOME
 liferea-dbg - liferea debug symbols
 liferea-webkit - webkit rendering engine for liferea
 liferea-xulrunner - transitional dummy package
Closes: 433393 475603
Changes:=20
 liferea (1.4.15-1) unstable; urgency=3Dlow
 .
   * New upstream release.
    - Fixes subscription not updated anymore when number of flagged items=
 =3D
     cache limit (Closes: #433393).
    - Fixes invalid XHTML in searches when using Swedish translation
     (Closes: #475603).
    - Several other bugfixes and translation updates, see upstream Change=
log.
   * Updated for new webkit:
    - Remove webkit-update-revert patch, which existed for compatibility =
with
     older webkit snapshots.
    - Update Build-Depends to libwebkit-dev
